meanings.sent1: The pirates were pirating treasure from the ship.
meanings.sent2: The pirates were caught pirating goods from passing ships.
meanings.sent3: The pirates were pirating so much treasure, they needed a bigger ship!
meanings.sent4: The pirates were pirating the ocean, seeking their next target.
meanings.sent5: The pirates were pirating the seas, their black flag a warning to all.

meanings.definition: To illegally copy or distribute copyrighted material.
meanings.sent1: He was pirating movies online without permission.
meanings.sent2: She was caught pirating music and faced legal consequences.
meanings.sent3: The students were pirating movies instead of studying for their exams.
meanings.sent4: The company discovered someone pirating their software and took action.
meanings.sent5: The artist's work was pirating across the internet, impacting their sales.
